repos.name: PRD-047: MCP Browser Automation Benchmark
repos.focus: Complete --watch flag, tier-2 correctness scoring (reject 'not installed' as success), Makefile + CI workflow. Core benchmark already runs — harden and automate it.

repos.name: PRD-048: Browser Use Fallback Agent
repos.focus: Add CLI (--action navigate|extract|screenshot|health), unit tests (test fallback chain + browser_take_screenshot tool name), retry logic, PlaywrightSession persistent subprocess, save_screenshot helper. Core fallback chain already built.

repos.name: PRD-049: ACTP Computer Use Workflow Integration
repos.focus: Payload validation, actp_browser_tasks Supabase migration + audit log, browser_use_health data plane method, capability registration, seed browser-use-research workflow, integration tests, blueprint setup script, ENV_CONFIG.md update. Executor already registered.

repos.name: PRD-050: Content Recreation from Browser Analysis
repos.focus: Build content_recreation_agent.py: ContentAnalyzer (Claude Haiku signals), ContentRecreator (Claude Sonnet 6 formats), recreate_from_url(), batch mode, discover mode, DB migrations, ContentRecreationExecutor, data plane methods, unit tests. Integrates with browser_use_agent (PRD-048) and Remotion pipeline.

repos.name: PRD-105: Remotion Renderer Auto-Start & Volume Engine
repos.focus: RendererHealthCheck auto-start/watch-loop, JobQueueFiller (fill to 15), RenderDispatcher (atomic claim + poll), OutputHandler (enqueue MPLite + thumbnail), VolumeTracker (10/day target), flush_pending_jobs() for 11 stuck jobs, 3 migrations (retry_count/completed_at/output_path), 4 health routes, 5 tests.

repos.name: PRD-106: HookLite Hard-Reject Gate Integration
repos.focus: HookScorer (POST to HookLite Vercel), GateEnforcer (block if score<85), RegenerationLoop (max 3 retries), patch organic_publisher.py + workflow_executors.py + research-to-blotato workflow, 2 migrations (actp_gate_attempts, actp_gate_stats), 4 health routes, 5 tests.

repos.name: PRD-107: Cross-Platform Video Adaptation Engine
repos.focus: VideoTranscoder (ffmpeg: 9:16/1:1/16:9 + audio normalize + SRT), CaptionAdapter (5 platforms with correct char limits + hashtag counts), MetadataBuilder, AdaptedPayloadBuilder.adapt_all() returns 5 payloads + enqueues to MPLite, 1 migration (actp_adapted_payloads), 2 health routes, 5 tests.

repos.name: PRD-108: AI Thumbnail Generator
repos.focus: FrameExtractor (ffmpeg), FrameScorer (brightness/contrast/face/composition), TextOverlay (PIL: hook text + gradient + branding, 3 platform styles), ThumbnailSelector (upload to Supabase Storage, A/B variant tracking), integrate into OutputHandler, 1 migration (actp_thumbnail_stats), 2 health routes, 5 tests.

repos.name: PRD-109: Comment Engagement Boost (First 30min)
repos.focus: PostMonitor (30min boost window), FirstCommentEngine (Claude Haiku question + post to Safari ports 3004-3007), ReplyEngine (AI replies to incoming comments), EngagementTracker (1hr/4hr/24hr checkbacks → viral/flop classification → feed actp_feedback_posts), 3 migrations, 3 health routes, 5 tests.

repos.name: PRD-110: Content Consistency Dashboard
repos.focus: ViewsTrendTracker (rolling 30-post avg), FollowerVelocity (daily gain + ETA to 1M), ConsistencyScore (posts/day vs 2.5 target), QualityTrendTracker (hook scores over time), NichePerformance (views by niche), WeeklyReporter (Telegram Sunday 20:00), 4 migrations, seed YouTube 2810 + 25 youtube_video_stats rows, 6 health routes, 5 tests.

repos.name: PRD-100: Cognitive Orchestrator Terminal (COT)
repos.focus: Main orchestrator brain: GoalTracker, DailyPlanner, AgentDelegator, OutcomeEvaluator, OptimizationEngine, goals.py config, daily_routine.py with APScheduler 06:00 cron, 3 Supabase migrations, 5 health server routes, 5 tests.

repos.name: PRD-101: Agent Spawner & Self-Healing System
repos.focus: AgentRegistry, ProcessLauncher, HealthMonitor, CircuitBreaker, SelfHealingLoop, CapabilityRegistry, 4 Supabase migrations, 5 pre-registered agents, 6 health server routes, 5 tests.

repos.name: PRD-102: Content Generation Agent
repos.focus: TrendResearcher, BatchGenerator (10+ per call), HookGate (top-5% threshold), PlatformAdapter (5 platforms), PublishRouter (Blotato/MPLite/Safari), ViralFeedbackLoop (viral/flop classification), FollowerTracker with ETA to 1M, 3 health server routes.

repos.name: PRD-103: Autonomous Acquisition Agent
repos.focus: ProspectDiscovery, ICPScorer (batch Claude), WarmupSequencer (3-touch), OutreachOrchestrator (LinkedIn/Upwork/DM/Email), CRMBridge, ConversionTracker, 2 Supabase migrations, Julian Goldie seed, fire_pending_outreach() for 22 LinkedIn + 2 Gmail queued messages, 4 health server routes.

repos.name: PRD-104: Revenue & Analytics Agent
repos.focus: StripeTracker (MRR/churn/projection), AppleTracker (App Store Connect API, 21 apps), AudienceTracker (followers/views/ETA to 1M per platform), CostMonitor ($400/month ceiling), GoalProgressEngine (all goals 0.0-1.0), ReportGenerator (daily/weekly Telegram reports), 4 Supabase migrations, 6 health server routes, 3 tests.

repos.name: Safari Instagram Test Suite (103 tests)
repos.focus: Write pytest test suite for Instagram DM (port 3001/3100) and Comments (port 3005): 103 tests across health, auth, core ops, error handling, edge cases, rate limiting, Supabase integration, AI features, native MCP tool calling, and session management.

repos.name: Safari Twitter Test Suite (103 tests)
repos.focus: Write pytest test suite for Twitter DM (port 3003) and Comments (port 3007): 103 tests. Mark composeTweet typing tests as xfail (known regression). Include 280-char validation, AI reply generation, rate limit, and MCP tool calling tests.

repos.name: Safari TikTok Test Suite (103 tests)
repos.focus: Write pytest test suite for TikTok DM (port 3102) and Comments (port 3006): 103 tests. Video URL must be direct /video/ format. Test inbox-search and profile-fallback strategies. Include engagement stats, creator analytics, and MCP tool calling.

repos.name: Safari LinkedIn Test Suite (103 tests)
repos.focus: Write pytest test suite for LinkedIn Automation (port 3105): 103 tests. Use dry_run=true for connection requests. Test force=true bypass, AI scoring (0-100 integer), prospect pipeline, outreach campaigns, and rate limits (10 reqs/day enforced).

repos.name: Safari Threads Test Suite (103 tests)
repos.focus: Write pytest test suite for Threads Comments (port 3004) and research (port 3106): 103 tests. Use correct endpoint /api/threads/comments/post. Test 500-char limit, ThreadsResearcher.researchNiche, engagement filters, and batch commenting.

repos.name: Safari Market Research Test Suite (103 tests)
repos.focus: Write pytest test suite for Market Research Hub (port 3106): 103 tests covering all 4 platforms (instagram/twitter/tiktok/threads). Test POST /api/research/{platform}/search with {keyword, maxResults}. Include async competitor research, top-creator ranking, niche resonance, and Supabase persistence checks.

repos.name: MCP Native Tool Calling Test Suite (103 tests)
repos.focus: Write pytest test suite for all 5 MCP servers (playwright, steipete, joshrutkowski, lxman, peakmojo): 103 tests. Covers MCP JSON-RPC 2.0 protocol, browser_navigate/snapshot/screenshot tools, AppleScript execution, Safari session management, and stdio error handling. Set PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH env var.

repos.name: Safari MCP Agents — Final Claude Code E2E Validation (103 tests)
repos.focus: FINAL VALIDATION: Use Claude Code's own native MCP tools (mcp6_safari_* and mcp7_safari_*) to call each Safari automation service live — one feature at a time. No pytest writing. Directly invoke health_check, session_ensure, send_dm, post_comment, market_research, competitor_research, and Safari Inspector tools. Record pass/fail per feature in scripts/tests/safari_e2e_results.json. This is the capstone E2E test confirming the full Safari MCP stack works end-to-end.

repos.name: Main Terminal — Observe, Dispatch & Business Objectives Integration (103 tests)
repos.focus: Write comprehensive pytest test suite (tests/test_terminal_dispatch_comprehensive.py) covering the full main terminal stack: local service_registry dispatch (35+ services, ACD observe+dispatch, data plane, memory plane) and cloud terminal (CRMLite /api/agent/*, Workflow Engine). Tests validate NL→intent→dispatch→result pipelines, all business objectives (outreach, content, revenue, research), memory+data plane integration, cross-local/cloud sync, and full audit observability. Unit tests mock HTTP; integration tests marked separately.

repos.name: PRD-200: EverReach OS — Unified Hybrid Orchestrator Core (50 features)
repos.focus: Build HybridOrchestrator — single codebase that runs in cloud/local/hybrid mode. ENV detection, action_classifier (compute=local, api=cloud), LocalExecutor wrapping service_registry.dispatch, CloudExecutor with retry+fallback, offline cache (SQLite), SyncBus (Redis+SQLite fallback), cost_guard ($400/month cap), Docker local stack (docker-compose: local-terminal + redis + chroma + prometheus), APScheduler 06:00 daily routine, route_table.json. MUST be built before PRD-201 and PRD-202.

repos.name: PRD-201: EverReach OS — Cloud Terminal + Auto-Scaling Agent Swarm (50 features)
repos.focus: Build cloud terminal (FastAPI port 8090), AAGSwarm with 10+ auto-scaling agents (ProspectingAAG + DmAAG + FollowUpAAG), Kubernetes manifests (Deployment, Service, HPA min=2 max=10, CronJob scale schedule), AWS EventBridge cron rules, Stripe/RevenueCat/Hunter/Upwork integrations, $400/month cost log (Supabase actp_cost_log), FailoverWatcher with Telegram alerts, revenue goal tracker ($9.5K Month 1), viral burst detection. Requires PRD-200.

repos.name: PRD-202: EverReach OS — Shared Vector DB, Feedback Sync & Prometheus Monitoring (50 features)
repos.focus: Build VectorDB wrapper (Chroma + pgvector backends, 4 collections), embedding pipeline (content/prospect/outcome/lesson), FeedbackSyncEngine (record_outcome → classify → embed → strategy rebuild after 10), delta sync (local→cloud), data privacy (prospect_embeddings LOCAL_ONLY, PII scrubber, encrypted transit), Prometheus metrics (MRR, flop_rate, followers, cost, dispatch latency), Grafana dashboard JSON, Telegram AlertManager integration, retention job. Requires PRD-200 + PRD-201.

repos.name: PRD-203: EverReach OS — Claude Coding Agent (ECCA) with MCP Access (50 features)
repos.focus: Build the EverReach Claude Coding Agent (ECCA): CodingAgent class spawned from HybridOrchestrator, 6 Dockerized MCP servers (code-context, code-assistant, code-execution sandbox, vector-code, linter, per-client GitHub), closed-loop pipeline (plan→retrieve→write→execute→lint→test→evaluate→iterate→deliver→store), Claude 3.5 Sonnet for generation + Haiku for evals, batch_generate (10+ subtasks/call), per-client GitHub OAuth, Upwork webhook trigger, rork_batch for 21 Expo apps, daily_code_loop cron. Requires PRD-200+PRD-202.

repos.name: PRD-111: Native Tool Agent Framework (NTAF)
repos.focus: Base class for all Claude native tool-calling agents. ToolRegistry (register/lookup/validate), ClaudeToolRunner (Anthropic API tool_use loop until end_turn), AgentMemory (short-term messages + Supabase long-term), SelfHealingMixin (error counting + restart signal), AgentReporter (actp_agent_runs lifecycle). 4 Supabase migrations (actp_agent_runs, actp_agent_memory, actp_agent_tasks, actp_tool_call_log), 4 health routes, 6 tests. MUST be built first — PRD-112 through PRD-115 all extend this base class.

repos.name: PRD-112: Safari Social Media Domain Agent
repos.focus: Extends NativeToolAgent (PRD-111). 20 tools across 12 Safari ports: research_niche (3106), post_instagram_comment (3005), post_tiktok_comment (3006), post_twitter_reply (3007), post_threads_comment (3004), send_instagram_dm (3001), send_tiktok_dm (3002), send_twitter_dm (3003), linkedin_search/connect/message (3105), get_follower_counts, get_engagement_stats, get_crm_contacts, queue_outreach, get_pending_posts, mark_comment_posted. LinkedIn dry_run=True default, Twitter reply-only (no composeTweet), max 10 LinkedIn/day. 3 preset goals: engagement_boost (every 15min), niche_research (4hr), prospect_session (11:00+15:00). 1 migration (actp_engagement_actions), 3 health routes, 6 tests.

repos.name: PRD-113: Content Creation Domain Agent
repos.focus: Extends NativeToolAgent (PRD-111). 22 tools: research_top_niches, generate_batch_scripts (min 10/call), score_hooks_batch (HookLite >=85), regenerate_script (max 3x), check_renderer_health, start_renderer, trigger_render (GenLite), flush_stuck_renders (fixes 11 stuck jobs), trigger_adaptation (PRD-107), trigger_thumbnail (PRD-108), enqueue_to_mplite, get_post_performance, classify_post (viral>100K/strong>10K/etc), save_viral_template, get_viral_templates. 3 preset goals: daily_pipeline (06:00), flush_and_publish_pending (2hr), viral_analysis (Sunday). 2 migrations (actp_viral_templates, actp_gate_stats), 3 health routes, 6 tests.

repos.name: PRD-114: Acquisition Domain Agent
repos.focus: Extends NativeToolAgent (PRD-111). 24 tools: search_linkedin_prospects, score_prospect (ICP rubric), update_prospect_stage (Awareness→Decision→Closed Won), queue_linkedin_message (force=True), queue_twitter_dm, queue_gmail_outreach (Julian Goldie email Mon 13:00 UTC), send_pending_outreach, search_upwork_jobs, score_upwork_job, generate_proposal (Claude Sonnet), submit_upwork_proposal, get_revenue_pipeline, get_monthly_targets ($9.5K M1). LinkedIn 10/day rate limiter. 4 preset goals: daily_prospecting (11+15:00), pipeline_advance (09:00), upwork_scan (2hr), julian_goldie_email (13:00 UTC). 2 migrations (actp_deal_log, actp_revenue_goals), 3 health routes, 6 tests.

repos.name: PRD-116: Agent Worker Daemon
repos.focus: worker.py — single entry point that starts all 4 domain agents (PRD-112 to PRD-115) as async daemons. AgentSupervisor (start/watch/restart with crash backoff 2^n up to 300s), AgentRegistry (UPSERT to actp_agent_registry at startup), HealthHeartbeat (30s interval), GracefulShutdown (SIGTERM/SIGINT drain 30s then force), DailyRoutineScheduler (APScheduler 6 crons: content 06:00, revenue 08:00, acquire 09:00, prospect 11+15:00, cost_audit 23:00, weekly Sun 20:00), HealthServer aiohttp port 8090 (GET /health, /agents, /agents/:id, /agents/:id/restart, POST /agents/task, GET /scheduler/jobs). NativeToolAgent.run_as_daemon(poll_interval) loop with crash isolation. CLI flags: --agents, --dry-run, --list-agents, --restart-agent. 1 migration (actp_agent_registry), 6 tests.

repos.name: PRD-117: Orchestrator-to-Agent Task Bridge
repos.focus: task_bridge.py — message bus between Cognitive Orchestrator (PRD-100) and all 4 domain agents. TaskRouter (regex-based goal→agent routing table, 4 patterns), TaskDispatcher (validate + INSERT with TTL, expiry, cancel), TaskResultPoller (asyncio poll with timeout), OutcomeReporter (feed results back to Orchestrator, update performance_score), TaskAuditor (full task trace: created→claimed→tools→completed), PriorityQueue (CRITICAL=100/HIGH=75/NORMAL=50/LOW=25 weights, SELECT FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED). TaskBridge public API: dispatch_goal, dispatch_from_gap_analysis, dispatch_daily_routine (4 morning tasks), get_system_status. Patches NativeToolAgent.get_next_task() to use PriorityQueue.claim_next(). 4 migrations (extends actp_agent_tasks, actp_orchestrator_feedback, performance_score, priority index), 5 health routes, 9 tests.

repos.name: PRD-118: ACD Validation & Parallel Test Runner
repos.focus: validate.py — pre-flight validator before worker.py starts. FeatureListValidator (all PRDs 100-118 pass rates, blocking/ready categorization), PytestParallelRunner (asyncio.gather all test suites in parallel, parse passed/failed counts), MigrationChecker (19 required tables, async parallel existence checks), EnvChecker (3 required + 7 optional env vars, colored print_summary), SafariPortChecker (11 ports parallel health check, critical subset: 3001/3002/3005/3106), ServiceEndpointChecker (7 cloud service /api/health URLs). ValidationReporter: build_report → launch_recommendation: safe_to_launch/partial_launch/fix_first. Save to actp_validation_reports. CLI: --fast (skip pytest), --prd PRD_ID, --fix-missing-tables, --json (CI mode exit code). 5 health routes, 8 tests.

repos.name: PRD-119: Product Launch Agent
repos.focus: Extends NativeToolAgent (PRD-111). 28 tools: App Store Connect API (JWT auth via APPLE_KEY_ID/.p8 file, list_apps, get_app_status, create_version, submit_for_review, get_review_status, upload_screenshot, set_metadata, enable_phased_release, get_download_stats, get_review_queue), Expo EAS (trigger_eas_build subprocess, get_build_status, submit_to_app_store, get_pending_builds, get_rork_apps_queue), Stripe (get_subscriptions for EverReach $19.99 + ClientPortal $49, get_breakdown vs $3.5K target, get_churned, get_trial_conversions, create_promo_coupon, get_upcoming_renewals, get_payment_failures), ProductMetrics (get_product_goal_status: EverReach 100 users / ClientPortal 30, get_ratings, save_snapshot, get_rork_progress, get_revenue_by_product, flag_churn_risk). Self-healing: EAS retry once after 1hr, REJECTED→HIGH task, Stripe 401 pause 30min. Crons: daily 07:00, EAS queue 4hr, Stripe campaign Mon 09:00, weekly review Sun 19:00. 3 migrations (actp_app_submissions, actp_product_snapshots, actp_churn_risks), seed 21 Rork app rows, 4 health routes, 5 tests.

repos.name: PRD-120: Cross-Agent Goal Optimizer
repos.focus: GoalOptimizerAgent extends NativeToolAgent (PRD-111) — outer closed-loop controller. 30 tools: GoalGapAnalyzer (6 KPIs: revenue vs $9.5K/mo + $50K cumulative, products user counts, audience vs 1M/platform, autonomy %, content quality %, efficiency vs $400 cap), AgentPerformanceRanker (success_rate + quality per domain, iteration delta, tool distribution), StrategyAmplifier (winning templates viral_score>0.8 → amplify, winning outreach sequences → scale, winning niches → double down), StrategyKiller (flop templates viral_score<0.2 + test_count>=3 → retire, losing niches → kill, failed outreach → retire), SystemPromptTuner (Claude-driven prompt improvement via performance data, actp_agent_prompts + actp_prompt_history, rollback support), ResourceRebalancer (dynamic priority boost: revenue<50%→acquisition CRITICAL, audience<30%→social+content HIGH, cost>80%→pause batch). 5 migrations (actp_agent_prompts, actp_prompt_history, actp_optimization_runs, actp_niche_kills, alter actp_viral_templates). Seed: initial prompts for all 5 agents. Crons: 05:30 daily (before morning routine), Saturday 23:00 weekly. 5 health routes, 6 tests.

repos.name: PRD-121: MCP Registry & Discovery System
repos.focus: mcp_registry.py — dynamic MCP discovery and loading. MCPDiscoveryAgent: search npm registry, GitHub (MCP_GITHUB_TOKEN), mcp.so, glama.ai in parallel → deduplicate + rank by composite score → classify domain via Claude → validate top 5 → register. MCPValidator: connect_stdio (JSON-RPC initialize), list_tools, test_tool_call, extract_tool_manifest, get_compatibility_score. MCPRegistry: UPSERT actp_mcp_registry, get_servers_for_domain, get_tools_by_capability. MCPServerManager: start/stop/restart asyncio subprocesses, actp_mcp_processes tracking. MCPConnectionPool: live JSON-RPC client per server. MCPToolLoader: inject mcp_{server}_{tool} callables into NativeToolAgent tool_registry. MCPHealthMonitor: 60s ping loop, auto-restart on failure, actp_mcp_health_events. NativeToolAgent patches: load_mcp_tools(domain) on __init__, reload_mcp_tools() hot-reload. Seed 7 pre-validated MCPs: github, brave-search, puppeteer, filesystem, stripe, playwright, slack. 4 migrations, 5 health routes, 6 tests.

repos.name: PRD-122: Claude Code Agent Launcher
repos.focus: claude_launcher.py — main terminal that spawns `claude --print --output-format json` subprocesses on demand. MCPConfigBuilder: build .mcp.json per domain from actp_mcp_registry (inject env vars, get_tool_allowlist per agent type). SystemPromptBuilder: compose from actp_agent_prompts + MCP tool descriptions + EverReach base context ($5K/month, 1M followers, $400 cost cap). AgentSession: asyncio subprocess lifecycle (start, stream_output async generator, wait_for_completion, cancel, get_cost_estimate). SessionPool: asyncio.Semaphore per agent_type (content-agent capped at 1 session for cost), acquire/release. OutputParser: parse newline-delimited JSON stream → extract_tool_uses, extract_result, extract_usage, detect_error. SessionLogger: actp_claude_sessions + actp_claude_tool_uses (source: native/mcp), cost to anthropic_cost_log. ClaudeCodeAgentLauncher.launch() full pipeline + launch_from_queue() (poll use_claude_code=true tasks) + launch_batch(). worker.py patch: route use_claude_code=true tasks to launcher. 3 migrations (actp_claude_sessions, actp_claude_tool_uses, alter actp_agent_tasks), 4 health routes, 6 tests. Requires: claude binary in PATH, CLAUDE_CODE_BIN/MODEL/MAX_CONCURRENT/SESSION_TIMEOUT env vars.

repos.name: PRD-115: Revenue & Analytics Domain Agent
repos.focus: Extends NativeToolAgent (PRD-111). 26 tools: get_stripe_mrr, get_apple_revenue (App Store Connect API JWT), get_upwork_earnings, get_total_monthly_revenue (4 streams), get_revenue_vs_target ($9.5K), get_cumulative_revenue ($50K goal), get_follower_counts, get_follower_velocity, get_eta_to_1m (YouTube: 2810 subs), get_avg_views_per_video, get_ai_cost_today/month/projected ($400 ceiling), get_goal_gap_analysis, create_goal_gap_task (orchestrator), generate_weekly_report_md, send_telegram_report, save_weekly_snapshot. AnthropicCostTracker patches NativeToolAgent._call_claude() — tracks every API call cost. AppStoreConnectClient with JWT auth. 3 preset goals: daily_check (08:00), weekly_report (Sunday 20:00), cost_audit (23:00). 3 migrations (anthropic_cost_log, actp_weekly_snapshots + seed, actp_revenue_goals), 4 health routes, 6 tests.

repos.name: Ad Creative Testing Pipeline (ACTP)
repos.focus: Cross-system orchestrator: Remotion video gen + MediaPoster publishing + ad testing + WaitlistLab offers. Build DB schema first, then orchestrator, creative engine, publishers, analytics, winner selector, ad deployer, iteration engine.
